name: Idle Valentine's
description:
Click the heart, unlock more upgrades and have fun!

Happy Valentine's Day!

CONTROLS:

Left Click Heart/Right Click Heart/Space - Generate Hearts

F1: View Reset Menu
F5: Save Game
Ctrl + Shift + Alt + Backspace: Delete ALL saved data.

Update 2/14/2016 - 11:38pm CST:

  • Some minor cosmetic changes. Darkened background, changed most text to white. Now only the Prestige Display text is affected by your prestige level.
  • Made Cupid's Arrows generate 2x hearts.
